original_text: Then God sent an evil spirit between Abimelech and the men of Shechem; and the men of Shechem dealt treacherously with Abimelech:
korean_text: 하나님이 아비멜렉과 세겜 사람들 사이에 악한 영을 보내시매 세겜 사람들이 아비멜렉을 배반하였으니

sentences.original_text: Then God sent an evil spirit
between Abimelech and the men of Shechem
and the men of Shechem dealt treacherously
